name: Mondrian Mirror Large in Cream Shagreen and Bronze-Patina Brass
description: The Mondrian Mirror Large is a playful graphic piece with its geometric mixture of mirror parts and cream shagreen parts that are placed on different levels. The shagreen parts have a discreet metal indentation detail adding another element of luxury to the piece. This mirror can be hung different ways to create a different expression each time. The shagreen is hand-dyed by artisans creating a one of a kind piece each time. Currently made to order 6-7 weeks.
